definition: to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
to run fast/to speed/to gallop/to disseminate/to spread
Mercedes Benz/abbr. to 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
pinyin: Mei2 sai4 de2 si1 Ben1 chi2

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推動全世界的改裝奔馳車。

sentences.english: When we exam the brand, you will see Mercedes-Benz actually is a contributor to auto safety.
sentences.chinese: 作爲老牌的汽車企業，奔馳在安全領域有獨到的聲望。

sentences.english: A body of horsemen came galloping towards him.
sentences.chinese: 有幾個騎者向他奔馳而來。

sentences.english: Jack swallowed hard as he watched the black Mercedes speed away.
sentences.chinese: 傑克艱難地嚥下一口唾沫，看着黑色奔馳車絕塵而去。

sentences.english: Wer reitet so sp(a:)t durch Nacht und Wind?
sentences.chinese: 這樣遲誰在黑夜和風中奔馳？

sentences.english: Benz now manufactures expensive, luxury cars.
sentences.chinese: 奔馳公司如今生產昂貴的奢侈車。

sentences.english: Your mercedes wasn't enough, you brats.
sentences.chinese: 你們有了的奔馳不夠，你們這羣臭小子。

sentences.english: They are even going to put a little Mercedes badge by the wrist.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至想在腕部放一個小的奔馳徽章。

sentences.english: If you say Zhou Benchello has no lofty ambition, I could never agree.
sentences.chinese: 不過，誰說周奔馳沒有遠大的理想我敢和誰急。

sentences.english: If you say Zhou Benchi has no lofty ambition, I could never agree.
sentences.chinese: 不過，誰說周奔馳沒有遠大的理想我敢和誰急。

sentences.english: I'm going after the missile launcher inside that Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 我準備死盯着奔馳車裏的導彈發射器。

sentences.english: Excuse me, who is your to speed a car?
sentences.chinese: 請問誰是你們的奔馳車？

sentences.english: A fine horse is running fast on the grassy plain.
sentences.chinese: 一匹駿馬在大草原上奔馳。

sentences.english: Who's that guy in the Mercedes Benz?
sentences.chinese: 坐在奔馳車裏的那個傢伙是誰？

sentences.english: Soon, the car galloped along the road again like a horse.
sentences.chinese: 很快，汽車像一匹馬那樣又在公路上奔馳起來。

sentences.english: It ran like a streak, just a blur of black.
sentences.chinese: 它奔馳如電，恰似一道朦朧的黑影。

definition: one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
